tool_description: Manages and retrieves appropriate response templates based on review sentiment, category, and business context to ensure consistent and relevant automated responses.

sentiment.description: Primary sentiment of the review: positive, negative, or neutral

category.description: Review category such as product_quality, shipping, customer_service, pricing

business_type.description: Type of business: retail, service, restaurant, software, healthcare

response_tone.description: Desired tone for response: professional, friendly, apologetic, grateful

include_alternatives.description: Whether to return alternative template options

error_messages: Invalid sentiment value: Use one of [positive, negative, neutral].
Invalid business type: Use one of [retail, service, restaurant, software, healthcare].
Invalid response tone: Use one of [professional, friendly, apologetic, grateful].
No templates found: No matching templates exist for the specified sentiment and category combination.
usage: Provide sentiment and category parameters from review analysis results. Optionally specify business_type and response_tone for more targeted templates. Set include_alternatives to true to get multiple template options.

primary_template.description: Main response template for the given parameters

template_variables.description: Variable placeholders in the template that need customization

usage_guidelines.description: Guidelines for using and customizing the template
